name: OtpQrSafety
summary: Safety checks for OTP QR rendering parameters.

methods.name: GetContrastRatio
methods.summary: Computes a contrast ratio between two colors (1.0..21.0).

methods.name: Evaluate
methods.summary: Evaluates OTP scan safety for a rendered QR code.

fields.name: RecommendedQuietZone
fields.summary: Recommended quiet zone size in modules.

fields.name: MinimumContrastRatio
fields.summary: Minimum recommended contrast ratio between foreground and background.
